plot: The story of a young man in college whose father is murdered in a demolition derby competition. Distraught and under the encouragement of a ghost, he drops out of school and attends the subsequent derby in his father's place.
title: Vengeance de los Muertos
plot_es: The story of a young man in college whose father is murdered in a demolition derby competition. Distraught and under the encouragement of a ghost, he drops out of school and attends the subsequent derby in his father's place.
plot_en: The story of a young man in college whose father is murdered in a demolition derby competition. Distraught and under the encouragement of a ghost, he drops out of school and attends the subsequent derby in his father's place.
